price: 35. Ma jirto waxaa aheyn dhimashadayada hore mana nihin kuwo dib loo soo nooleyn.
arabic: إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّا مَوۡتَتُنَا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُنشَرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: in hiya illā mawtatunā al-ūlā wamā naḥnu bimunsharīna
